timeline.bodyText: Did they share the same entity type or were the all of them a ZombieEntity just with a flag
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: EntityType didn't exist back then in the code, there was only Class<? extends Entity>. They were all the same class with just this flag.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: I'd probably say they were the same entity then in the comment
replies.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: "same entity" would imply to me that they are the same entity instance
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: Maybe "same type of entity"? That'd work around "entity type" being taken while still meaning the same time.
replies.author: haykam821

timeline.message: Clarify that we mean "type of entity"
